channel.title: Linalifox on 2021 Design Refresh
channel.description: Recent content in Linalifox on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: Blue
item.description: Week 4: Murky Silhouettes. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes I began this piece with a cyan background and started painting in a dark blue. I found it a challenge as I did not have the usual variety of colours to work with, especially with no red tone at all used in the skin. However I eventually learnt to blend the two blues and make them work and thoroughly enjoyed the process.
